answers.answer: I don't think that's very much over a month period.  If your eating healthy & taking your vitamins you don't have anything to worry about.  Weight gain is so different for everybody. Don't stress over it.  :)

You may want to have a glucose test done just in case if youre worried? Rapid weight gain can be the sign of preeclampsia. Very important to make sure you dont have it if you continue to rapidly gain weight.
It also depends on the stage of your pregnancy.  Until the 20th week, the volume of blood in your body increases. a lot, as well as liquid retention. How far along r u?
I had weight loss all the way up till my last appt, which i gained 6lbs in a month!! She didn't seem to think anything was wrong with it but it freaked me out too!!
I used to gain like 5 lbs a week

question: so is it normal to gain like 6 lbs in a month? like wth I'm kind of scared but all Ibeen doing is eating healthy iI don't get it !!
title: omg
